mapper.sql: ORGID, PARENTID, ORGNAME, ORGTYPE, ORGLEVEL, O, REMARK, CREATOR, CREATETIME, MODIFIER, MODIFYTIME, LEADER_ID, DEPT_CODE
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from AORG
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into AORG (ORGID, PARENTID, ORGNAME, ORGTYPE, ORGLEVEL, O, REMARK, CREATOR, CREATETIME, MODIFIER, MODIFYTIME, LEADER_ID, DEPT_CODE) values (#{orgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orglevel,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{o,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{leaderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deptCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

ORGID,
PARENTID,

ORGTYPE,
ORGLEVEL,
O,
REMARK,
CREATOR,

mapper.select: SELECT a2.userid , a.dept_code FROM AORG a LEFT JOIN Auser a2 ON a.ORGID = a2.ORGID WHERE a2.USERNAME =#{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update:
update AORG
PARENTID = #{parentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORGNAME = #{orgname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORGTYPE = #{orgtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORGLEVEL = #{orglevel,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

MODIFIER = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFYTIME = #{modifytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LEADER_ID = #{leaderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEPT_CODE = #{deptCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ORGID = #{orgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update AORG set PARENTID = #{parentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORGNAME = #{orgname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORGTYPE = #{orgtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORGLEVEL = #{orglevel,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, O = #{o,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MODIFIER = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFYTIME = #{modifytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LEADER_ID = #{leaderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEPT_CODE = #{deptCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ORGID = #{orgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
